channel.title: ★ Epicurus ★ [New management, new hosting!] [Frequent content, great community]
channel.description:
[center][url=http://epicurus-ps.com][IMG]http://rsps.net/images/epicu.png[/img][/url]
Join us here: http://epicurus-ps.com
[size=14pt]The time has come where Epicurus must rise from it's grave and provide you, our beloved player base, an all round enjoyable and efficient server and community. With a dedicated staff team here to provide constant help and updates, you can rest assured that you will not regret joining us! Our server is simple; it focuses on all the great aspects of RuneScape without the tedious tasks that the real game makes you do.
Feel like taking on some deadly bosses for [b]epic[/b] loot? Take a loot at the PvM side of the server. Want to fight other players to the [b]death[/b] with pleasing rewards? Jump right into the active PvP our server offers. Simply want to show off your [b]hard work[/b] and [b]dedication[/b] to skilling? All skills are working perfectly![/size]
[/center][b]Current Features:[/b]
[ul][li]Grand Exchange[/li] [li]Party Room for Drop Parties[/li] [li]Flawless Lottery[/li] [li]Flawless Dicing[/li] [li]Flawless Duel Arena & Staking[/li] [li]Flawless Shopping System[/li] [li]Flawless Banking & Searching[/li] [li]Perfect Farming System[/li] [li]PK Leader-boards[/li] [li]Rank Icon Changing System[/li] [li]Flawless Loyalty Titles[/li] [li]Flawless Donator System (To be implemented)[/li] [li]Perfect Curse System[/li] [li]Flawless Hybridding[/li] [li]Weapon Combination Staking[/li] [li]Boss Fights with Perfect Drops[/li] [li]Combat Stat Resets[/li] [li]Perfect Slayer System[/li] [li]Random PvP Rewards[/li] [li]Working Clue Scrolls & Rewards[/li] [li]Working Minigames & Rewards[/li] [li]Perfect Combat System & PvP weapons[/li] [li]Custom Capes (To be implemented)[/li][/ul] [center]
[size=20pt][b][i]??? PvM and Bossing ???[/i][/b][/size]
[b][i]SLAY THE MONSTERS OF THE WORLD[/i][/b]
[img]http://gyazo.com/5234910f23074d985377049209e14e1f.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/e1eb9cf74faf0b7a27e068435b41f977.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/f7f7dafc18e75538341bc082114bb3d8.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/7f1da1bd0800e46e538be412cbd4ee85.png[/img]
[b][i]TAKE ON THE MIGHTY GODS[/i][/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/8c9664fe05302a66e460ae13801629c4.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/abcd8d769743dac08360da298d54fe54.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/7e6dcf31db228258a6ccdaaeab397cdc.png[/img]
[b][i]DEFEAT THE EPIC BOSSES[/i][/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/6313ab5a19c386f9f37bdf48ee2eaa5a.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/b9c26f91b7f42272e91f9ba2e34e2850.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/774e0d4f8e529fc751d9f6454001e2b3.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/bea6aee40c0683b67770b6a4e9264ef3.png[/img]
[size=20pt][b][i]??? PvP and Clan Fights ???[/i][/b][/size]
[i][b]Keep track of your vengeance![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/2953dc0d78ffd3a23318e18a10194840.png[/img] [i][b]Kill others for epic rewards![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/278140749d4b89c9b8aee55ece4ed303.png[/img] [i][b]Reset a stat to become a Pure![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/f4f76cf471b6f85184db92647d187896.png[/img] [i][b]Team up Clan VS Clan with working Clan Chats![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/bbd092048239ae665dcfdbed7f45c36a.png[/img] [i][b]Show off your PvP skills with our Leaderboards![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/cc770f98f820a08e0876609258f318f2.png[/img] [i][b]Stake away and make a Fortune![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/67790ef4e33ae7f01521a6c940ed89de.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/b4e600f685e44c1b379627fbc44e3f1c.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/5d2b4d142f7db8bb390cd438a0b0388b.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/f8cf901497f8f135bb1bd47515990cea.png[/img]
[size=20pt][b][i]??? Skilling and Hard Work ???[/i][/b][/size]
[i][b]Max out with every working skill![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/5240605dafdb0bba2ee45932059ce4fd.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/263af73bd21e0ce01a0c3aba0b23e097.png[/img] [i][b]Select your training spot![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/9bb3e510feec00115f735e5063a7086b.png[/img]
[size=20pt][b][i]??? Other Important Information ???[/i][/b][/size]
[i][b]Keep your account secure![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/3164b1a9768b378ce07fbf63ec83e8ae.png[/img] [i][b]Change your username![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/7206c25df761d90b7d747eaa0d4c5dd5.png[/img] [i][b]Complete clue scrolls![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/8e2dcd75809b16e6a61ccfc73f547950.png[/img] [i][b]Gamble with the risk of winning big![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/165e46724996b718b5e2c178a8f7dd8a.png[/img] [i][b]Try your luck with the weekly lottery![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/27552988d2f32f62e9993149a71b2cd1.png[/img] [i][b]Show off your support by voting![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/49715cc7af611917fbb0791151945ada.png[/img] [i][b]Play minigames with others for new gear![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/b1cf2a7ea4649655bbf0facec945263c.png[/img] [i][b]Pest control rewards for example![/b][/i][/color] [img]http://gyazo.com/fe148606da978fc0dbbeb20059720283.png[/img] [i][b]Sell your items easily with the working GE![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/f8ef5883ff1cf264016dcc35a7226a42.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/cd3a462b62341013725613fec8b79f30.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/21cf2d08adc85d9838238178a0594d70.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/c8a6097bfb6db34c49efe323f13a82e0.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lYbMzMs.png[/img][/center]

item.title: ★ Epicurus ★ [New management, new hosting!] [Frequent content, great community]
item.dc:creator: @Tassos Tassos
item.description:
@Tassos wrote:

Love this server, been playing for 2 weeks and it is one of the best servers I have ever played, there is so much to do it never gets boring! I love the frequent updates as it keeps adding more content to play and enjoy.

here are some of the recent updates if anyone is intrested:

Hard barrows has been released
Slayer shop has been altered, now contains slayer bond which will give you 15% more points on your tasks for one day
New slayer shop item, ring of slaying which has 8 charges and can be used to teleport to different slayer locations, including the new slayer boss
Double death bug has been fixed with poison/recoil
Duel bug has been fixed "flagged duel"
Until clipping is worked on again, I have removed the ability to range over objects regardless of whether the object is traversable
Mining has been fixed to support levels for pickaxes
Dragon pickaxe emote has been fixed
Bug has been fixed in the slayer tower where you could click the stairs from the teleport location, more object clicking accuracy will be implemented over the next few days
Highscores issue which disconnected the server has been fixed and temporarily removed until we can provide our own database
Wilderness gate near chaos elemental is now functional
Duo slayer bug has been fixed to give the correct points/xp during your sessions
Small additions to the hard barrows in regards to farcasting.
Bugs have been fixed with hard barrows
Boss tasks have been started

Read full topic
item.source: ★ Epicurus ★ [New management, new hosting!] [Frequent content, great community]

item.title: ★ Epicurus ★ [New management, new hosting!] [Frequent content, great community]
item.dc:creator: @djzone djzone
item.description:
@djzone wrote:

AliAbid:

This is a pretty good server. My name in-game was EvilZezimaz as well as mike1w17, and I started playing about 2 years ago then quit from time to time, and I was recently gone for 5+ months, I see there is a huge reset, and a loss of players, but it looks like the server is improving.

We are a different party, determined to make it better than it was.

Sorry for the downtime, Epicurus’ host upgraded our hardware and now we can provide an even better gaming experience!

Read full topic
item.source: ★ Epicurus ★ [New management, new hosting!] [Frequent content, great community]

item.title: ★ Epicurus ★ [New management, new hosting!] [Frequent content, great community]
item.dc:creator: @djzone djzone
item.description:
@djzone wrote:

Yes objects were fixed.

Thank you Miss Silabsoft for pointing out issues

[quote=“Tcondren, post:111, topic:539549”]"Iron arrows cannot be used with shortbow."
slow clap[/quote]

Thanks, sorted. Content is still being pushed frequently

[ul][li]All donor zone objects functioning[/li] [li]Players are now able to mine pure essence by right clicking the Zamorak mage on the new client[/li] [li]Magic has been re-worked to account for damage percentage on items and potions[/li] [li]Glitch with the supporter bond has been fixed where it will still remove even if you have donated[/li] [li]A lot of new items have been added and a lot have been changed in terms of value and bonuses (Zardoct)[/li] [li]Boss 2/3 has been added, "Skele Trio" (Matt's idea)[/li][/ul]


[ul][li]Npcs now support prayer and multiple head icons[/li]
[li]Npcs now support prayer switches throughout combat at specified intervals (Your attacks will be useless if it’s the same as what they’re praying)[/li]
[li]Introduction to “sessions” and this is where you can partner up with another player, or a group of players to aid you in a specific task. For example, Duo Slayer, which is where you and your partner can link and you will share Slayer XP and Slayer Points. Support has been added for groups and other tasks, but not yet implemented. Soon to come.[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]Player kits are now functioning correctly thanks to Pk Prop for the debugging[/li]
[li]Mining now supports primal pickaxe[/li]
[li]Woodcutting now support primal hatchet[/li]
[li]Drop tables for new bosses have been added with some hefty loot (Zardoct)[/li]
[li]Balance elementals have been added which drop “Trio keys”, which allow access to the boss arena.[/li]
[li]Small alterations to drop tables. Frost dragons now drop Zamorak brews rather than Choc-ices.[/li]
[li]Small alterations to drop tables. Revenants now drop more frequent items and their rare drop rate has been increased.[/li]
[li]Balance elementals attack with 3 different styles and also cycle prayers[/li]
[li]Ice amulets have been given some magic bonus to act as a rather weak Arcane Stream Necklace[/li]
[li]6 Ice amulet can be used on an anvil, with a hammer in inventory, to create an Arcane Stream Necklace[/li]
[li]Choc-ices have been removed from the game and replaced with Zamorak Brews which will act a super set, boosting Attack, Strength and Defence only. All choc-ices obtained on your accounts will be automatically replaced upon login.[/li]
[li]Price alterations to boss point store. Zanik’s crossbow has been changed to 1000 points and pernix has been changed to 800 points.[/li]
[li]Zanik’s bow has been nerfed slightly.[/li]
[li]New players will now be prompted with the security screen so they can protect their account upon login.[/li]
[li]The telegrab spell is now functional[/li]
[li]A dupe has been fixed[/li]
[li]Logs have been re-written to log more in-depth information about what your game character is doing in the case that there is malicious actions against the server[/li]
[li]EPK leaderboards have been adjusted as multiple accounts were shown.[/li]
[li]New daily tasks have been added (Zardoct). Speak to Larissa in edgeville![/li]

[li]Support for displaying head icons for npcs[/li]
[li]A bug has been fixed where you type “-” and the client will crash[/li]
[li]A bug has been fixed with the parsing of patch information[/li]
[li]Some custom items/cosmetic items in the update[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
item.source: ★ Epicurus ★ [New management, new hosting!] [Frequent content, great community]
